Description: Beautiful 2 bed/2 bath in prime location in the Fenway/Back Bay border. This floor-through features hardwood floors throughout, two FULL bathrooms, a deck, and fully applianced kitchen with dishwasher/disposal. Laundry is in the building. Steps to Whole Foods, Berklee, Northeastern, the Green & Orange Lines, and countless restaurants, cafes, and shops. Unbeatable location, providing access to all the conveniences in the City.
